code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';import memoize from'lodash.memoize';var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectShopCollections=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollectionsForPreview=createSelector([selectShopCollections],function(collections){return Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];});});export var selectShopCollection=memoize(function(collectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectShopCollections],function(collections){return collections[collectionUrlParam];});});
